price: ߣߴߊ߬ ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߲ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߊ߲ ߕߘߍ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߞߋ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߣߘߐ߬ߛߌ߰ߦߊ ߞߍ߫
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِنكُم مَّلَٰٓئِكَةٗ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُفُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu lajaʿalnā minkum malāikatan fī al-arḍi yakhlufūna
